      TwoStepVerificationResponse RouteeTwoStepClient.getTwoStepVerificationStatus(java.lang.String trackingId)
      This method is used when you want to retrieve the status of a 2step verification by providing its trackingId.
      TwoStepReport RouteeTwoStepClient.retrieveTwpSteApplicationReports(java.lang.String appId)
      This method is used to retrieve 2step verification reports for any of your applications by providing the application id.
      TwoStepReport RouteeTwoStepClient.retrieveTwpStepAccountReports()
      This method is used to retrieve 2step verification reports from all of your applications.
      TwoStepVerificationResponse RouteeTwoStepClient.sendTwoStepVerification(SendTwpStepVerificationParameters parameters)
      You can send a 2Step verification very easily just by specifying the recipient, the type of the message and the method that the verification will be sent.
